instructors.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
instructors.bio: Dr. Sarah Johnson is a leading expert in artificial intelligence and machine learning with over 8 years of experience in both academia and industry. She has published over 50 research papers in top-tier conferences and journals, focusing on deep learning, computer vision, and natural language processing. Dr. Johnson has mentored hundreds of students and professionals in their AI journey.
instructors.education: Ph.D. in Computer Science, Stanford University

instructors.name: Prof. Michael Chen
instructors.bio: Professor Michael Chen is a distinguished data scientist with extensive experience in big data analytics, statistical modeling, and business intelligence. He has worked with Fortune 500 companies and has been instrumental in developing data-driven strategies. His research focuses on predictive analytics and statistical learning methods.

instructors.name: Dr. Emily Rodriguez
instructors.bio: Dr. Emily Rodriguez is a cybersecurity expert with a strong background in network security, ethical hacking, and digital forensics. She has worked with government agencies and private sector organizations to develop robust security frameworks. Her expertise includes penetration testing, incident response, and security architecture design.
instructors.education: Ph.D. in Cybersecurity, Carnegie Mellon University

instructors.name: Prof. David Kim
instructors.bio: Professor David Kim is a blockchain technology pioneer and Web3 development expert. He has been involved in the cryptocurrency space since its early days and has contributed to several open-source blockchain projects. His research focuses on decentralized applications, smart contracts, and blockchain scalability solutions.
instructors.education: M.S. in Computer Science, UC Berkeley

instructors.name: Dr. Lisa Wang
instructors.bio: Dr. Lisa Wang is a cloud computing expert with extensive experience in AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud platforms. She specializes in DevOps practices, containerization, and microservices architecture. Dr. Wang has helped numerous organizations migrate to the cloud and implement CI/CD pipelines for improved development workflows.
instructors.education: Ph.D. in Computer Engineering, University of Washington

instructors.name: Prof. James Thompson
instructors.bio: Professor James Thompson is a seasoned full-stack developer and software architect with over 15 years of experience in building scalable web applications. He has worked with various technologies including React, Node.js, Python, and Java. His expertise lies in creating robust, maintainable, and scalable software solutions.
instructors.education: M.S. in Software Engineering, University of Illinois
